name: Manggus
description: The Manggus is a large, chaotic evil giant with the ability to shapeshift into a terrifying three-headed hydra form. It is covered in dark hide armor, emphasizing its intimidating presence.
memorable: The Manggus can paralyze its foes with a terrifying roar and regenerate heads, making it a unique and fearsome opponent.
goals: The Manggus seeks to dominate its surroundings and instill fear in all creatures it encounters.
relations: Manggus may be encountered alongside other chaotic creatures or serve under more powerful giants in its territory.
environment: Often found in wild and untamed environments, particularly where it can lurk and ambush its prey.
strengths: Possesses the terrifying ability to frighten and paralyze enemies with its roar; can regenerate heads quickly.
weaknesses: Lower mental faculties make it susceptible to mental effects and social interactions.
attacks: Can strike multiple times with powerful bite attacks while in hydra form, or swing a greataxe for massive slashing damage in giant form.
most_powerful_ability: Roaring Transformation allows it to instill fear and potentially paralyze multiple enemies within range upon shifting forms.
equipment: The Manggus wields a greataxe in its giant form.
senses: Has passive Perception of 8, indicating low awareness.
skills: Proficient in intimidation, making it effective at instilling fear in others.
additional_information: Can regrow two heads at the end of its turn unless it has taken fire damage
Only reverts to true form if all heads are destroyed
Advantage on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, and knocked unconscious while in hydra form
test_queries: giant that can shapeshift and roar
